protocol.name: P-G6516-1
protocol.text: Tissue collected from developmentally matched control leaves after 7 weeks.

protocol.name: P-G6516-2
protocol.text: 10 21-day old Arabidopsis plants, grown under short-day conditions, were infested with 100 Silverleaf whiteflies (SLWF) (or not infested); contained by a nylon-mesh bag.  Tissue was collected from infested leaves 28 days post-infestation. Developmentally matched uninfested tissue was also collected.

protocol.name: P-G6516-3
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the Affymetrix Eukaryotic One-Cycle Target Labeling Assay protocol (Affymetrix GeneChip Expression, Analysis Technical Manual, Affymetrix, Santa Clara, CA)

protocol.name: P-G6516-4
protocol.text: RNAwiz extraction of total RNA, pooled from 2 biological replicates (total 20 plants), was performed according to the manufacturer's instructions.

protocol.name: P-G6516-5
protocol.text: 10 Three-week old Arabidopsis plants were infested with 100 Silverleaf whiteflies (SLWF) (or not infested); contained by a nylon-mesh bag.  Tissue was collected from infested leaves 28 days post-infestation. Developmentally matched uninfested tissue was also collected.

protocol.name: P-G6516-6
protocol.text: Tissue collected from SLWF infested leaves 28 days post-infestation.
